meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a particular region.
meanings.sent1: The local cuisine reflects the regional flavors of the area.
meanings.sent2: She traveled to experience the regional culture of the South.
meanings.sent3: The regional accent made her sound like a native of the town.
meanings.sent4: His artwork captures the essence of regional landscapes.
meanings.sent5: The regional climate varies greatly from one area to another.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or serving a region.
meanings.sent1: The regional hospital provides healthcare services to nearby towns.
meanings.sent2: The company expanded its regional offices to better serve customers.
meanings.sent3: The regional bus route takes passengers through scenic countryside.
meanings.sent4: Her regional expertise in marketing helped boost sales in the area.
meanings.sent5: The regional airline offers affordable flights to neighboring cities.
